BotEnvironment.SearchBot
Class BotSearch

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      BotEnvironment.SearchBot.Bot
          BotEnvironment.SearchBot.BotSearch
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public abstract class BotSearch
extends Bot

BotSearch is the abstract base class bots that will search through and traverse maps using a number of searching algorithms. Searching and movement are abstracted for extensions of this class to take care of managing node changes that will update the GUI. This way, the programmer of a Bot extension can work on implementing search and movement steps without worrying about correctly modifying the nodes when they should be modified.
